name: Nightmare Fist

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Improved Unarmed Strike, Intimidate 1 rank, ability to create magical darkness.

sections.text: While fighting within an area of magical darkness, you gain a +2 bonus on damage rolls with unarmed strikes, or a +4 bonus against opponents that are shaken, frightened, or panicked. You also gain a +2 morale bonus on Acrobatics and Intimidate checks.
sections.name: Benefits

description: You are even more deadly in magical darkness.
